title: Let Utah Read - Stop Censorship in Utah
short: We are a coalition dedicated to preserving Americans’ freedom to choose what we read. Please help support our anti-censorship work.
description:
Let Utah Read is a coalition of Utah community members, educators, parents, librarians, and educational and advocacy organizations — all dedicated to preserving Americans’ freedom to choose what we read. 

We believe that all Americans have the right to read and access diverse and inclusive literature, free from censorship or discrimination, and that libraries are the foundation for a vibrant and engaged US citizenry.

We work to stop censorship and protect libraries and librarians against attacks by providing information and action alerts to Utahns who support the freedom to read.  

Your donation will underwrite the important work of educating Utahns and elected decision-makers through events, social media, publishing, speaking, and coalition-building.
